title: The Choice
description: A Happy Spinster Series StoryFeaturing Tawny!Tawny returns in her third book of the popular Happy Spinster Series!While everything was going great with the new partner she met in The Date, Tawny faces some challenges as the relationship progresses.After a misunderstanding, someone from her past re-appears in her life!Will Tawny take a second chance at love?Does the misunderstanding get cleared up?Has she found someone new?Or...Will she end up single?
author: Karena Marie
